module.name: part_template_2d_shape
module.keywords: module, layout template, footprint, padstack, breakout, electrical, electronic, pattern, shape, two dimensional

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe component mating patterns to be realized in an interconnect substrate. The representation includes support for additional metalization to be realized as part of the pattern.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Component grouping, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1656;
items within the scope of application module Layered 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1693;
items within the scope of application module Non feature shape element, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1706;
items within the scope of application module Package, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1707;
items within the scope of application module Part template extension, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1718;
items within the scope of application module Part template shape with parameters, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1720;
items within the scope of application module Printed physical layout template, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1737.
